definition: to consult and act upon/privately run/commercial
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: Mercantilism thought in the civil enterprise was strong.
sentences.chinese: 商办民用企业思想浓重。

sentences.english: to undertake foreign related work assigned by the Administration or related departments.
sentences.chinese: 承担上级交办或有关部门委托商办的涉外工作。

sentences.english: In fact, it was a kind of obligation of businessman.
sentences.chinese: 商办采木实质上是一种加于商人的封建徭役。
